availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Q. C. Grasty (Jefferson County, Kentucky, notary public)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, notary public. Virginia native. Married to Olivia J. Blanchard Grasty in Jefferson County on May 10, 1855. Dentist in Chickasaw County, Mississippi, in 1850. Notary public in Jefferson County until c1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Mississippi, Chickasaw County, Eastern Division, p. 307B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1853-1860, Film #000482708, p. 173 of 471 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, 1853-1860, Film #000819602, p. 179 of 388 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
KYR-0001-017-0001.
